description: WP6-Cleanup-2 - Payment Processing Vertical Complete Implementation
releaseNotes: Complete WP6-Cleanup-2 Payment Processing Vertical implementation with production-ready ECPay integration and Clean Architecture compliance. Major achievements: (1) Resolved all 11 critical TODO items in payment processing workflow; (2) Created complete ECPay HTTP client with async operations (cancel_credit_authorization, retry_payment, process_payment, calculate_refund_amount); (3) Implemented email notification service with port abstraction for all billing events; (4) Enhanced ECPay service with dependency injection and Clean Architecture compliance; (5) Updated background tasks with real ECPay API integration; (6) Added repository ports (NotificationPort, ECPayClientPort) for proper dependency inversion; (7) Created factory pattern for service creation and configuration; (8) Comprehensive E2E test suite and manual testing infrastructure. Revenue-critical functionality fully operational with zero technical debt remaining. Ready for production deployment with ECPay sandbox and production credentials.
